title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant for New Start-Up
job_overview:
Opportunity to begin part-time with a new start-up ... QueerBoss ... with the potential to convert to full-time in the future. 

Overall scope of QueerBoss Virtual Assistant responsibilities:

# Funnel & Website Building
- Building sales funnels and multi-page websites (dUpgrade to see actual info between GoHighLevel and Kajabit now)
- Creating and optimizing landing pages and sales pages
- Managing, editing, and organizing client information, funnels, and pipelines

# Automation & CRM
- Creating workflow automations for payment processes, lead nurturing, and marketing promotions
- Manage leads, respond to inquiries, and build CRM pipelines
- Effective use of AI tools that help build professional content at scale

# Email Marketing & Copywriting
- Writing and designing email templates and marketing campaigns
- Drafting SEO-optimized captions, descriptions, and blog posts
- Copywriting for captions, promotions, and event materials
- Managing email outreach and follow-ups for guest posting and marketing

# SEO & Digital Marketing
- Implementing SEO strategies on sales pages, websites, and blogs
- Writing and proofreading SEO-optimized blog posts and articles
- Adding metadata, layouts, and copyright-free images to support SEO

# Video Editing & Content Creation
- Editing short-form and long-form videos and reels using Descript, CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro
- Designing and implementing membership courses (documents, quizzes, resources)
- Transcribing videos using Descript for captions or blog repurposing

# Social Media Management & Design
- Creating, scheduling, and posting content across platforms using GHL or other tools
- Designing graphics, infographics, posters, and presentations in Canva
- Managing events, groups, inquiries, and social media pages

# Research, Writing & Administrative Tasks
- Researching topics for content, captions, SEO, and design
- Creating ebooks (content, layout, design, formatting)
- Managing spreadsheets, templates, and organizing assets
- General virtual assistant tasks
- Content formatting, proofreading, and client support

Initial projects to be completed:

- Build initial website landing pages in GHL
- Build initial offer funnel and email automations in GHL
- Edit course videos (add branded intro, cut and edit for final publication)
- Create captions fo courses
- Build social brand awareness (create posts, reply to DMs/comments, etc)
- Effective use of AI tools

Applicants must be an LGBTQ+ ally and comfortable supporting the community. QueerBoss is an online professional development course community for the LGBTQ+ community.

Looking for someone willing to work hourly for approximately $3.00 to $5.00 USD / hour as we build up to a full-time position. Number of hours per week will vary on work.
